strings.string: Number of rows in TV guide
In list views: Pressing right (remote/keyboard) or hover with mouse shows extended information
... and of course all standard plugins of this MediaPortal version.
DefaultWideHD is designed for MP 1.7.x or newer versions.
TV OSD stream info always visible

Tetris is a well-known computer puzzle game popularised by the Game Boy. The aim of the puzzle is to manipulate tetromino pieces (blocks) or shapes by moving each one sideways and rotating them 90 degrees, with the aim of creating a horizontal line of blocks with no gaps. When such a line is created, it disappears and every block above the deleted line falls down. After every ten deleted lines, the game reaches a new level. As the game progresses, the tetrominoes fall faster with each level, and the game ends when the stack of tetrominoes reaches the top of the board and no more new tetrominoes can move in. The game can also end if the player manages to get to level 15.
How to play - To play - arrow right to enter the playground, then press Enter - Move blocks horizontal - left or right arrow - Rotate blocks - up arrow - Quick drop - down arrow - Instant drop - Enter - Pause or continue the game - Back remote control button, or Esc
The next block is displayed as a hint in the arrow graphic at the top right of the playing field. The level number is also displayed there in the corresponding level colour.
Smirnuff (author), catavolt and High_Five wish you lots of fun with Tetris ;)
Parts of the graphics and animations provided by High_Five :)
*** Congratulations! *** You have achieved a new highscore!
